title: There's a hefty reward in store for those who know about Clop ransomware links
description: Threats posed by CL0P are mounting, and a $10 million reward could be up for grabs to protect the US government.

title: Dashlane now supports passkeys on Android
description: Android 14 allows for the new passwordless technology to be handled by third-parties, and Dashlane is on board.

title: This iPhone 15 feature could truly unlock the Vision Pro's potential
description: New statements from analyst Ming-Chi Kuo point to enhanced interoperability between the iPhone 15 and Apple's Vision Pro headset.

title: Ready to be interviewed by AI for your next job? You might have to be
description: In 2024, many job interviews could be done by AI – does that make you more, or less, nervous?

title: This Samsung Galaxy Watch beta feature has big implications for Wear OS users
description: It looks like Samsung's One UI Watch 5 beta is holding a big Wear OS 4 secret.

title: Diablo 4 devs would love to 'fix all your problems tomorrow' but that’s impossible
description: After the successful launch of Diablo 4, Blizzard is looking for more substantial updates and balance patches.

title: Don't ask ChatGPT or Google Bard for a Windows 11 key - here's why
description: It seems that these chatbots can provide serial keys even for a modern Windows installation – but don’t be tempted…

title: Microsoft Azure and Outlook outages were caused by DDoS attacks
description: HTTP(S) flood attacks in the millions, cache bypass, and slowloris were all responsible for taking down Microsoft’s services.

title: The BlackCat ransomware gang is now threatening to leak stolen Reddit data
description: BlackCat claims to have 80GB of stolen data from Reddit, and is threatening to leak it if no agreement is met.

title: The new update for GTA Online is removing 180 cars and fans aren't happy
description: GTA Online: San Andreas Mercenaries update has removed 180 cars and placed others behind a paywall.

title: This new malware is proving quite popular... and dangerous
description: A sophisticated stealer has been being tracked since April and cybersecurity analysts are concerned about its scope.

title: Introducing TopScan: The ultimate automotive diagnostic tool for car enthusiasts and technicians
description: TopScan is the ultimate automotive diagnostic tool for car enthusiasts and technicians

title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Monday, June 19 (game #511)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.
